modules.label: Syntax and at-rules
modules.notes: Typed + unparsed declaration paths exist; advanced at-rule handling remains incomplete.

modules.label: Selectors
modules.notes: Custom selector parser/indexing is in place; parity expansion is planned.

modules.label: Cascade and inheritance
modules.notes: Specificity + source order + important channels implemented; full keyword/layer parity pending.

modules.label: Values and units
modules.notes: LengthSpec/CalcLength and fixed-point conversions exist; custom/unparsed length token paths now route through canonical `LengthPercentage` parsing and deterministic `min/max/clamp` reduction for context-free comparable calc domains (`custom_property_math_min_max_clamp_lengths`), while full value grammar parity remains open.

modules.label: Box model
modules.notes: ContainerFlowable handles margins/padding/borders/box-sizing; parity edge cases remain.

modules.label: Display and formatting contexts
modules.notes: Block/inline/flex/table/grid-like lowering exists; broader display parity remains.

modules.label: Positioning
modules.notes: Absolute, relative, and fixed positioning draw paths are implemented (including relative left/top/right/bottom in-flow offsets, fixed overlay repetition across paged output, fixed z-index underlay/overlay layering, deterministic z-index ordering within fixed overlay lanes, root-level absolute z-index back/front overlay composition on page one, explicit page-one scoping for both positive and negative z-index root absolute overlays under pagination, equal-specificity source-order z-index resolution coverage for root absolute overlays, specificity-precedence coverage where higher-specificity id selectors deterministically beat later lower-specificity class selectors for root absolute overlays, explicit width/height precedence over opposing inset pairs for absolute positioning in the current LTR model, empty absolutely positioned boxes with explicit size/background paint even with no text children, nearest-positioned-ancestor containing-block resolution for absolute insets including percentage inset basis, explicit-size absolute overflow without containing-block clamping, and auto-inset static-position fallback for absolute out-of-flow placement); full positioning semantics are not complete.

modules.label: Sizing
modules.notes: Width/height/min/max coverage exists for core containers; sizing algorithm parity is still partial.

modules.label: Text and fonts
modules.notes: Line-break, fallback, shaping hooks, and text styling exist; broad typography parity remains.

modules.label: Backgrounds and borders
modules.notes: Background colors, gradients, borders, radius, shadows exist with partial parity; fixture-backed border paint matrix now covers uniform borders and side-specific border color overrides (`borders_uniform_frame_paint_matrix`, `borders_left_color_override`) with evaluator-to-paint propagation.

modules.label: Lists and counters
modules.notes: List rendering exists; full counters/generated-content scope handling is pending.

modules.label: Overflow
modules.notes: Visible/hidden clipping support exists with fixture-backed absolute-child clip/bleed coverage (`overflow_hidden_clips_absolute_child`, `overflow_visible_allows_absolute_bleed`); richer overflow behavior remains open.

modules.label: Flexbox
modules.notes: FlexFlowable covers core behavior, including first-class flex-flow and place-content shorthand mapping into computed direction/wrap and align/justify channels, wrapped-line align-content distribution, item-level align-self cross-axis overrides, place-self shorthand mapping into item-level align-self compute semantics, place-items shorthand mapping into container align-items compute semantics, and justify-content distribution keywords (space-around/space-evenly); full flex spec edge-case parity remains.

modules.label: Grid
modules.notes: Baseline grid handling is implemented over deterministic flex internals with explicit `grid-template-columns`/`grid-template-rows` track counts (including `repeat(...)` mixed-list counting), slot-based `grid-row`/`grid-column`/`grid-area` start-line placement, deterministic conflict fallback to next free slot for overlapping explicit starts, and row-template-only column derivation; dedicated full grid solver parity is still planned.

modules.label: Tables
modules.notes: TableFlowable and table display modes exist, including split logic; deterministic header-repeat pagination baseline is fixture-covered (`table_header_repeat_across_pages`), while broader table parity remains partial.

modules.label: Transforms and coordinate spaces
modules.notes: Phase-1 transform path implemented for 2D translate/scale/rotate/skew/matrix (including longhands), transform-origin, deterministic composition of individual transform properties (translate/rotate/scale + transform), and var()/fallback chain resolution into computed transform ops; broader 3D/perspective parity remains open.

modules.label: Filters/effects/compositing
modules.notes: Deterministic fallback baseline is implemented for unsupported effects/compositing declarations via explicit known-loss diagnostics while keeping stable paint output; full filter/effect rendering semantics remain planned.

modules.label: Multi-column
modules.notes: Deterministic baseline fallback is implemented: multicol declarations are accepted and explicitly logged as known-loss with single-column degradation; dedicated multicol layout flow remains planned.

modules.label: Fragmentation
modules.notes: Break controls and split behavior exist across core flowables, with fixture-backed `break-inside: avoid` pagination baseline (`fragmentation_break_inside_avoid_block`); parity is still partial.

modules.label: Paged media
modules.notes: @page extraction and template selection exist, with fixture-backed forced page-break baseline (`paged_break_before_forced_block`); advanced paged media parity remains.

modules.label: Writing modes and logical properties
modules.notes: Baseline horizontal-tb/LTR logical mapping is implemented for inline/block sizing and logical margin/padding/inset longhands + shorthands with fixture coverage; full writing-mode/direction axis remapping and deeper logical sizing edge semantics remain open.

modules.label: Custom properties and API-adjacent parsing
modules.notes: Custom property support exists for key value classes; full generic token graph resolution is pending.
